about_the_game:
As a powerful female warrior, embark on new adventures on different maps in each chapter, defeat enemies, collect loot, and strengthen your equipment. Survive in this changing world with your strategy and skills.

INTER-CHAPTER ADVENTURE

Get ready to discover brand new sections in each section with our female warrior. Each section is full of its own challenges and mysteries, each new game starts with a different map, which makes each experience unique. In these sections full of different biomes and enemy types, you must constantly renew your strategy to survive and progress. A new adventure awaits you at every step; nothing is fixed in this universe, everything is variable.

FINAL BATTLE

At the end of each section, you will face a powerful section boss, the guardian of that section. These giant creatures have special abilities that will challenge you and your warrior. Defeating them not only unlocks sections, but also opens the door to valuable rewards. Each boss is a challenging final fight that pushes the boundaries of strategy and skill.

LOOT HUNT

Each creature you kill in battle leaves you with both the resources you need to survive and the money you need to buy more powerful equipment. Each new equipment takes your warrior character's abilities to the next level and brings you one step closer to victory.

ENDLESS EXPLORATION

Each new session of the game takes you to a different map. This means a new adventure and a new experience in every playthrough. As you progress through different levels and maps, you must constantly develop your strategy and find new solutions to survive in these worlds full of environmental hazards and creatures. Each session invites you to make new discoveries and push your limits.

  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500 or AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580 with 6GB of VRAM

Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6500 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia RTX 3060 or AMD RX 6600-XT with 6GB+ GB of VRAM
